name: Entangled Hearts
description:
[Fullscreen recommended!]

Paisley confessed her feelings to Tama months ago, but has yet to receive an answer... So tonight, on Valentines Day, she's going to try one more time. However, when Tama arrives at the park to meet her, she senses that something isn't right. Could it be the heavy Nightmare activity in the city tonight? Or is a more sinister plot unfolding?
(Created for Magical Girl Game Jam #3, Feb-Mar 2021! Themes: Entanglement, Energy)

"Entangled Hearts" can be played by itself. However, it is part 3 of Tama and Paisley's adventures. To play them in order:

  1. https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/within-her-heart
  2. https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/paisleys-heart-a-magical-girl-origin-story
  3. "Entangled Hearts"

Controls:

  • [AWSD] or [ARROW KEYS] to move
  • Press [LEFT MOUSE] or [N] up to 3 times in a row to combo attack
  • Hold [LEFT MOUSE] or [N] to use a ranged attack (requires MAGIC)
  • Hold [RIGHT MOUSE] or [M] to BLOCK ranged attacks
  • [E] or [B] to heal (requires MAGIC)
  • [E] or [B] to advance text during story scenes

For even more Magical Girl adventures, check out the entire Basin Lake Magical Girls series: https://itch.io/c/1097042/basin-lake-magical-girls-series
